potions.effects: Eases digestion and stomach discomfort.

potions.effects: Treats common wounds and mild pain.

potions.effects: Boosts immune response and energy.

potions.effects: Reduces effects of colds and clears lungs.

potions.name: Sunpetal Salve
potions.effects: Soothes skin irritation and rashes.

potions.name: Dewdrop Brew
potions.effects: Cleanses the body and aids fertility.

potions.name: Nightsleep Draft
potions.effects: Helps you fall asleep quickly and dream clearly.

potions.name: Lavender Lift
potions.effects: Reduces stress and enhances clarity.

potions.name: Snaproot Extract

potions.effects: Promotes wound healing and guards against infection.
